<a id="class_ResourceImporterSVG"></a>

# ResourceImporterSVG

**Inherits:** [ResourceImporter](class_resourceimporter.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Imports an SVG file as an automatically scalable texture for use in UI elements and 2D rendering.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This importer imports [DPITexture](class_dpitexture.md) resources. See also [ResourceImporterTexture](class_resourceimportertexture.md) and [ResourceImporterImage](class_resourceimporterimage.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_base_scale"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **base_scale** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_base_scale)

Texture scale. ``1.0`` is the original SVG size. Higher values result in a larger image.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_color_map"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **color_map** = `{}` [ðŸ”—](#class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_color_map)

If set, remaps texture colors according to [Color](class_color.md)-[Color](class_color.md) map.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_compress"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **compress** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_compress)

If ``true``, uses lossless compression for the SVG source.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_saturation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **saturation** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_ResourceImporterSVG_property_saturation)

Overrides texture saturation.
